alert.note: Alert for Coastal Brazoria; Inland Brazoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 1:49PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Brazoria County through 215 PM CDT... At 148 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over southeastern Lake Jackson, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake Jackson, southern Angleton, Freeport, Clute, Richwood, Brazoria, Jones Creek, Oyster Creek, southern Bailey`s Prairie and southeastern Wild Peach Village. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
